languages.text: "В иных обстоятельствах я бы не просил вас о подобной услуге, однако..." {n}Гримаса боли отпечатывается на лице Фелека, когда он отнимает руку от подреберья и видит собственную кровь.{/n} "Однако благополучие Леди Кассии превыше всего. У меня осталось не так много людей, а раны слишком глубоки, чтобы действовать быстро и точно. Но вы... у вас может получиться".

traits.locale_text: "В иных обстоятельствах я бы не просил вас о подобной услуге, однако..." {n}Гримаса боли отпечатывается на лице Фелека, когда он отнимает руку от подреберья и видит собственную кровь.{/n} "Однако благополучие Леди Кассии превыше всего. У меня осталось не так много людей, а раны слишком глубоки, чтобы действовать быстро и точно. Но вы... у вас может получиться".

languages.text: "I would never ask you for such a favour under different circumstances, and yet..." {n}Felek takes his hand away from his rib cage, notices blood, and winces in pain.{/n} "And yet Lady Cassia's well-being is above all. I haven't got many people left, and my wounds are too deep for me to act with precision and swiftness. But you... you may actually succeed."
languages.original_text: "В иных обстоятельствах я бы не просил вас о подобной услуге, однако..." {n}Гримаса боли отпечатывается на лице Фелека, когда он отнимает руку от подреберья и видит собственную кровь.{/n} "Однако благополучие Леди Кассии превыше всего. У меня осталось не так много людей, а раны слишком глубоки, чтобы действовать быстро и точно. Но вы... у вас может получиться".

traits.locale_text: "I would never ask you for a favour under different circumstances, and yet..." {n}Felek takes his hand away from his rib cage, notices blood and winces in pain.{/n} "And yet Lady Cassia's well-being is above all. I do not have many people left, and my wounds are too deep to act with the required precision and swiftness. But you... You may actually succeed."

"I would never ask you for a favour under different circumstances, and yet..." {n}Felek takes his hand away from his rib cage, notices blood and winces in pain.{/n} "And yet Lady Cassia's well-being is above all. I do not have many people left, and my wounds are too deep to act with the required precision and swiftness. But you... You may actually succeed."

I haven't got many people left, and my wounds are too deep for me to act with precision and swiftness. But you... You may actually succeed."

"I would never ask you for such a favour under different circumstances, and yet..." {n}Felek takes his hand away from his rib cage, notices blood, and winces in pain.{/n} "And yet Lady Cassia's well-being is above all. I haven't got many people left, and my wounds are too deep for me to act with precision and swiftness. But you... you may actually succeed."

"I would never ask you for such a favour under different circumstances, and yet..." {n}Felek takes his hand away from his rib cage, notices blood, and winces in pain.{/n} "And yet Lady Cassia's well-being is above all. I haven't got many people left, and my wounds are too deep for me to act with precision and swiftness. But you... you may actually succeed."

languages.text: "Unter anderen Umständen würde ich niemals um einen solchen Gefallen bitten, doch ..." {n}Felek nimmt seine Hand von seinen Rippen, bemerkt Blut und verzieht vor Schmerzen das Gesicht.{/n} "Doch Lady Cassias Wohlergehen steht über allem. Ich habe nicht mehr viele Leute übrig, und meine Wunden sind zu tief, als dass ich präzise und schnell handeln könnte. Ihr jedoch ... Ihr könntet tatsächlich Erfolg haben."
languages.original_text: "I would never ask you for such a favour under different circumstances, and yet..." {n}Felek takes his hand away from his rib cage, notices blood, and winces in pain.{/n} "And yet Lady Cassia's well-being is above all. I haven't got many people left, and my wounds are too deep for me to act with precision and swiftness. But you... you may actually succeed."

traits.locale_text: "Unter anderen Umständen würde ich niemals um einen solchen Gefallen bitten, doch ..." {n}Felek nimmt seine Hand von seinen Rippen, bemerkt Blut und verzieht vor Schmerzen das Gesicht.{/n} "Doch Lady Cassias Wohlergehen steht über allem. Ich habe nicht mehr viele Leute übrig, und meine Wunden sind zu tief, als dass ich präzise und schnell handeln könnte. Ihr jedoch ... Ihr könntet tatsächlich Erfolg haben."

languages.text: « Je ne vous demanderais jamais un tel service en d'autres circonstances, mais... » {n}Felek retire sa main de sa poitrine, remarque du sang et grimace de douleur.{/n} « Mais le bien-être de dame Cassia passe avant toute autre considération. Il ne me reste plus beaucoup d'hommes, et mes blessures sont trop profondes pour me permettre d'agir avec rapidité et précision. Vous, en revanche... Vous pourriez y arriver. »
languages.original_text: "I would never ask you for such a favour under different circumstances, and yet..." {n}Felek takes his hand away from his rib cage, notices blood, and winces in pain.{/n} "And yet Lady Cassia's well-being is above all. I haven't got many people left, and my wounds are too deep for me to act with precision and swiftness. But you... you may actually succeed."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous demanderais jamais un tel service en d'autres circonstances, mais... » {n}Felek retire sa main de sa poitrine, remarque du sang et grimace de douleur.{/n} « Mais le bien-être de dame Cassia passe avant toute autre considération. Il ne me reste plus beaucoup d'hommes, et mes blessures sont trop profondes pour me permettre d'agir avec rapidité et précision. Vous, en revanche... Vous pourriez y arriver. »

languages.text: “如果换做是其他情况，我绝不会冒昧请您帮这个忙，然而……”{n}费雷克将手从肋骨上移开，手上满是血迹，痛得绷紧了脸。{/n}“然而，卡西娅女士的安全高于一切。我身边已经不剩多少人了，而且我受的伤太重，在战斗中恐怕会相当拖累。不过，若是您……您说不定能做得到。”
languages.original_text: "I would never ask you for such a favour under different circumstances, and yet..." {n}Felek takes his hand away from his rib cage, notices blood, and winces in pain.{/n} "And yet Lady Cassia's well-being is above all. I haven't got many people left, and my wounds are too deep for me to act with precision and swiftness. But you... you may actually succeed."

traits.locale_text: “如果换做是其他情况，我绝不会冒昧请您帮这个忙，然而……”{n}费雷克将手从肋骨上移开，手上满是血迹，痛得绷紧了脸。{/n}“然而，卡西娅女士的安全高于一切。我身边已经不剩多少人了，而且我受的伤太重，在战斗中恐怕会相当拖累。不过，若是您……您说不定能做得到。”

languages.text: 「他の状況なら、こんな頼み事は決してしない。だが…」{n}フェレックは胸から手を離すと、血に気づき、痛みに顔をしかめた。{/n}「それでも、カシア様のご無事が何より大切だ。残された部下は少ないし、傷が深すぎてしっかりと迅速には動けない。しかし、あなたなら…あなたならやれるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "I would never ask you for such a favour under different circumstances, and yet..." {n}Felek takes his hand away from his rib cage, notices blood, and winces in pain.{/n} "And yet Lady Cassia's well-being is above all. I haven't got many people left, and my wounds are too deep for me to act with precision and swiftness. But you... you may actually succeed."

traits.locale_text: 「他の状況なら、こんな頼み事は決してしない。だが…」{n}フェレックは胸から手を離すと、血に気づき、痛みに顔をしかめた。{/n}「それでも、カシア様のご無事が何より大切だ。もう残った部下は少ないし、傷が深すぎてシッカリと迅速には動けない。しかし、あなたなら…あなたならやれるかもしれない」
「他の状況なら、こんな頼み事は決してしない。だが…」{n}フェレックは胸から手を離すと、血に気づき、痛みに顔をしかめた。{/n}「それでも、カシア様のご無事が何より大切だ。残された部下は少ないし、傷が深すぎてしっかりと迅速には動けない。しかし、あなたなら…あなたならやれるかもしれない」

languages.text: «En otras circunstancias, nunca le pediría un favor, pero...». {n}Felek aparta la mano de su torso, ve la sangre y hace un gesto de dolor.{/n} «Pero el bienestar de lady Cassia lo es todo. Apenas me queda personal y la gravedad de mis heridas me impide actuar con la precisión y la celeridad necesarias. Pero usted... podría conseguirlo».
languages.original_text: "I would never ask you for such a favour under different circumstances, and yet..." {n}Felek takes his hand away from his rib cage, notices blood, and winces in pain.{/n} "And yet Lady Cassia's well-being is above all. I haven't got many people left, and my wounds are too deep for me to act with precision and swiftness. But you... you may actually succeed."

traits.locale_text: «En otras circunstancias, nunca le pediría un favor, pero...». {n}Felek aparta la mano de su torso, ve la sangre y hace un gesto de dolor.{/n} «Pero el bienestar de lady Cassia lo es todo. Apenas me queda personal y la gravedad de mis heridas me impide actuar con la precisión y la celeridad necesarias. Pero usted... podría conseguirlo».

languages.text: "Şartlar farklı olsa böyle bir şeyi asla istemezdim. Gel gör ki..." {n}Felek, elini kaburgasından çekip kanı fark ediyor. Acıyla irkiliyor.{/n} "Gel gör ki Leydi Cassia'nın selameti her şeyden önce geliyor. Fazla adamım kalmadı ve aldığım ağır yaralar da dikkatli ve seri hareket etmemin önünde engel. Ama sen... Sen bu işi halledebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "I would never ask you for such a favour under different circumstances, and yet..." {n}Felek takes his hand away from his rib cage, notices blood, and winces in pain.{/n} "And yet Lady Cassia's well-being is above all. I haven't got many people left, and my wounds are too deep for me to act with precision and swiftness. But you... you may actually succeed."

traits.locale_text: "Şartlar farklı olsa böyle bir şeyi asla istemezdim. Gel gör ki..." {n}Felek, elini kaburgasından çekip kanı fark ediyor. Acıyla irkiliyor.{/n} "Gel gör ki Leydi Cassia'nın selameti her şeyden önce geliyor. Fazla adamım kalmadı ve aldığım ağır yaralar da dikkatli ve seri hareket etmemin önünde engel. Ama sen... Sen bu işi halledebilirsin."
